    • 方法详细资料

      • allowCashout

        public void allowCashout(Context respCtx,
                java.math.BigDecimal actualCashout)
                  throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: MerchantService
        When cashout is allowed for current operator, below condition will be checked:
        1. cashout limit
        2. whether exceeds the cashout day level
        指定者:
        allowCashout 在接口中 MerchantService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cashout transaction.
        actualCashout - The actual amount of cashout.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • allowSale

        public void allowSale(Transaction context,
             BaseTicket ticket)
               throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: MerchantService
        Verify whether a merchant can sale a given game.
        指定者:
        allowSale 在接口中 MerchantService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • allowPayout

        public void allowPayout(Context respCtx,
               Game game,
               PayoutLevelAllowRequest[] levelAllowRequests,
               java.math.BigDecimal actualPayout)
                 throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: MerchantService
        Whether a merchant can perform payout, includes:
        1. the merchant's payout limit
        2. the allowed prize level of a given game
        指定者:
        allowPayout 在接口中 MerchantService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of payout transaction.
        game - THe game which will be payout.
        levelAllowRequests - The request DTO contains the requested prize levels. If is null, the prize level check will be ignored.
        actualPayout - The actual payout amount
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • getMerchant

        public Merchant getMerchant(long merchantId)
                     throws ApplicationException
        指定者:
        getMerchant 在接口中 MerchantService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • getMerchantByOperator

        public Merchant getMerchantByOperator(java.lang.String operatorId,
                             boolean forUpdate)
                               throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: MerchantService
        Lookup merchant by operator. A operator can be allocated to only one merchant.
        指定者:
        getMerchantByOperator 在接口中 MerchantService
        参数:
        operatorId - The id of operator.
        forUpdate - Whether lock the returned merchant entity.
        返回:
        the merchant which manages the operator.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • supportedGameType

        public java.util.List<GameType> supportedGameType(long merchantId)
                                           throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: MerchantService
        Find all supported game types of given merchant.
        指定者:
        supportedGameType 在接口中 MerchantService
        参数:
        merchantId - The merchant to which the operator is assigned.
        返回:
        all supported game types.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business related exception.

      • allowDailyCashout

        protected void allowDailyCashout(Context respCtx,
                     java.math.BigDecimal actualCashout)
                          throws ApplicationException
        When cash out, a merchant can only cashout a given max amount.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cashout transaction.
        actualCashout - The actual amount of cashout.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • allowCashoutByLimit

        protected void allowCashoutByLimit(Context respCtx,
                       java.math.BigDecimal actualCashout)
                            throws ApplicationException
        When cash out, system check the cashout-limit of the merchant.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cashout transaction.
        actualCashout - The actual amount of cashout.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • verifyPayoutByLevel

        protected void verifyPayoutByLevel(Context respCtx,
                       Operator operator,
                       java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> requestedPrizeLevels,
                       int gameType,
                       int groupType)
                            throws ApplicationException
        This operation will check whether a merchant has privilege to payout a set of specific prize levels.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current transaction.
        operator - The operator who try to perform payout.
        requestedPrizeLevels - The requested prize levels which the merchant try to payout.
        gameType - The game type of prize.
        groupType - Refer to PrizeGroupItem.GROUP_TYPE_XXX
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if any of the requested prize level is rejected.
